idea: HiLoo is a concept that solves one of the most crucial problem faced by travellers on road. It is nothing but- "Loos on Highways". It is a idea that is aligned with the Swatch Bharat Abhiyaan and aims at providing clean and hygienic washrooms to both males as well as females on the GO! It also caters to the sanitary needs and problems faced by women travellers.
name: HiLoo

idea: Myself Arun kumar vyas , I started my Face Astrology & Started my weekly zodiac sign predictions named Vyas Card , I made 225k Followers world wide & people follow me across the world & consult me for their future knowing & guidance , also they share my all predictions on Instagram & whatsapp also , It's really a proud moment for me as first my our astrology appreciated world wide
name: Arun kumar vyas astrologer

idea:
As a youth-led, not-for-profit organization, we are a platform that aims to inspire young minds of tomorrow in the field of science and scientific thinking.

With science and technology rising to the forefront now more than ever, our platform delivers insightful, simple and practical experiment kits that foster scientific learning and innovation.

Our carefully curated experiments adopt new learning methods that extend beyond the classroom. We believe that hands-on activities truly empower students to take on an active role in thinking, learning, and understanding.

At The Science Society, we nurture young minds into the scientists of tomorrow.
name: The Science Society

idea: We are an enterprise SaaS platform democratizing ESG adoption for enterprises. idea: To carry on the business of software designing, development, customization, implementation, maintenance, testing and benchmarking, website designing, web hosting, and dealing in computer software and solutions, and to import, export, sell, purchase, distribute, host (in data centers OR over the web/cloud) or otherwise deal in own and third party computer software packages, programs and solutions and to provide internet / web / mobile based applications, infrastructure services and security solutions, provide or take up IT related assignments on sub-contracting basis, offering services on-site / offsite or through development centers using owned / hired or third party infrastructure and equipment, to undertake IT enabled services like data processing, Back office processing, Data warehousing and database management, network management, data center management and providing consultancy in all these areas.

idea:
KD Click has a rich history, of being an industry leader in providing a wide assortment of quality, brand-name & more

Our customers are passionate about the products they want to buy—they want to run faster, jump higher, hit the ball harder, carry their team to victory, and more. We understand the passion that comes with being dedicated to a goal.

We are dedicated to providing our customers with the best shopping experience possible by consistently providing great brands at great values. We are dedicated to increasing that value by providing industry-leading customer service and product knowledge. We are dedicated to you, and helping you take your game to the next level. If this is what you have been looking for in a sporting goods retailer, then you've come to the right store.
name: KD SPORTS & FITNESS
